languages.text: "Читать цвета ксеносов для меня мучительное испытание. Слишком... больно зрить неисчерпаемую палитру красок, что источает Ирлиэт. Ее оттенки яркие, ослепляющие, неестественные... И очень, очень опасные, Лорд-капитан. Я бы никогда не доверилась существу, столь явно кричащему о своей чуждости человеческому восприятию".

traits.locale_text: "Читать цвета ксеносов для меня мучительное испытание. Слишком... больно зрить неисчерпаимую палитру красок, что источает Ирлиэт. Ее оттенки яркие, ослепляющие, неестественные... И очень, очень опасные, Лорд-капитан. Я бы никогда не доверилась существу, столь явно кричащему о своей чуждости человеческому восприятию".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Reading xenos' colours has always been a gruelling challenge for me. The boundless palette of colours Yrliet emanates is... too painful to look at. Her hues are bright — blinding — unnatural... And very, very dangerous, Lord Captain. I would never entrust my safety to a being that screams so loudly and clearly of its alienness to human perception."
languages.original_text: "Читать цвета ксеносов для меня мучительное испытание. Слишком... больно зрить неисчерпаемую палитру красок, что источает Ирлиэт. Ее оттенки яркие, ослепляющие, неестественные... И очень, очень опасные, Лорд-капитан. Я бы никогда не доверилась существу, столь явно кричащему о своей чуждости человеческому восприятию".

Her hues are bright — blinding — unnatural... And very, very dangerous, Lord Captain. I would never entrust my safety to a being that screams so loudly and clearly of its alienness to human perception."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “对我而言，观察异形的颜色始终都是个艰巨的挑战。伊莉耶特身上散发的颜色，仿佛无边无际的调色板……看着它会令我很痛苦。她的色调过于明亮，过于刺眼，过于不自然……而且非常、非常危险。她身上异类的特质实在是太过明显，与人类的感知格格不入。我绝不会把我的人身安全托付给这样的生物，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "Reading xenos' colours has always been a gruelling challenge for me. The boundless palette of colours Yrliet emanates is... too painful to look at. Her hues are bright — blinding — unnatural... And very, very dangerous, Lord Captain. I would never entrust my safety to a being that screams so loudly and clearly of its alienness to human perception."

traits.locale_text: “对我而言，观察异形的颜色始终都是个艰巨的挑战。伊莉耶特身上散发的颜色，仿佛无边无际的调色板……看着它会令我很痛苦。她的色调过于明亮，过于刺眼，过于不自然……而且非常、非常危险。她身上异类的特质实在是太过明显，与人类的感知格格不入。我绝不会把我的人身安全托付给这样的生物，舰长大人。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Reading xenos' colours has always been a gruelling challenge for me. The boundless palette of colours Yrliet emanates is... too painful to look at. Her hues are bright — blinding — unnatural... And very, very dangerous, Lord Captain. I would never entrust my safety to a being that screams so loudly and clearly of its alienness to human perception."

languages.text: «Leer los colores de los xenos siempre ha supuesto un desafío para mí. La paleta sin límites que emana de Yrliet es... dolorosa de ver. Sus tonos son brillantes, cegadores, antinaturales... y extremadamente peligrosos, Lord Capitán. Nunca podría confiar mi seguridad a alguien cuyo ser proclama de forma tan clara sus diferencias con la percepción humana».
languages.original_text: "Reading xenos' colours has always been a gruelling challenge for me. The boundless palette of colours Yrliet emanates is... too painful to look at. Her hues are bright — blinding — unnatural... And very, very dangerous, Lord Captain. I would never entrust my safety to a being that screams so loudly and clearly of its alienness to human perception."

traits.locale_text: «Leer los colores de los xenos siempre ha supuesto un desafío para mí. La paleta sin límites que emana de Yrliet es... dolorosa de ver. Sus tonos son brillantes, cegadores, antinaturales... y extremadamente peligrosos, Lord Capitán. Nunca podría confiar mi seguridad a alguien cuyo ser proclama de forma tan clara sus diferencias con la percepción humana».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「異種族の色を読むことは、私にとって常に過酷な挑戦でした。ユリエットが発する無限の色のパレットは…見るのも辛いものです。彼女の色合いは目もくらむほどに明るく、不自然です…そして非常に危険です、ロード・キャプテン。人間の知覚に異質であることを声高に叫ぶ存在に、私の安全を委ねることは決してできません」
languages.original_text: "Reading xenos' colours has always been a gruelling challenge for me. The boundless palette of colours Yrliet emanates is... too painful to look at. Her hues are bright — blinding — unnatural... And very, very dangerous, Lord Captain. I would never entrust my safety to a being that screams so loudly and clearly of its alienness to human perception."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族の色を読むことは、私にとって常に過酷な挑戦でした。ユリエットが発する無限の色のパレットは…見るのも辛いものです。彼女の色合いは目もくらむほどに明るく、不自然です…そして非常に危険です、ロード・キャプテン。人間の知覚に異質であることを声高に叫ぶ存在に、私の安全を委ねることは決してできません」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Die Farben von Xenos zu lesen, war für mich schon immer eine zermürbende Herausforderung. Die grenzenlose Farbpalette, die Yrliet ausstrahlt ist ... zu schmerzhaft, um sie überhaupt anzusehen. Ihre Töne sind kräftig — blendend — unnatürlich ... Und sehr, sehr gefährlich, Lord Captain. Ich würde meine Sicherheit niemals einem Wesen anvertrauen, dass derart laut und deutlich herausschreit, dass es die menschliche Wahrnehmung nicht versteht."
languages.original_text: "Reading xenos' colours has always been a gruelling challenge for me. The boundless palette of colours Yrliet emanates is... too painful to look at. Her hues are bright — blinding — unnatural... And very, very dangerous, Lord Captain. I would never entrust my safety to a being that screams so loudly and clearly of its alienness to human perception."

traits.locale_text: "Die Farben von Xenos zu lesen, war für mich schon immer eine zermürbende Herausforderung. Die grenzenlose Farbpalette, die Yrliet ausstrahlt ist ... zu schmerzhaft, um sie überhaupt anzusehen. Ihre Töne sind kräftig — blendend — unnatürlich ... Und sehr, sehr gefährlich, Lord Captain. Ich würde meine Sicherheit niemals einem Wesen anvertrauen, dass derart laut und deutlich herausschreit, dass es die menschliche Wahrnehmung nicht versteht."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Il m'a toujours été difficile de lire les couleurs des xénos. La palette qui émane d'Yrliet est... trop pénible à regarder. Ses teintes sont vives, aveuglantes, anormales... et très, très dangereuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Jamais je ne ferais confiance à un être qui crie haut et fort sa non-appartenance à l'humanité. »
languages.original_text: "Reading xenos' colours has always been a gruelling challenge for me. The boundless palette of colours Yrliet emanates is... too painful to look at. Her hues are bright — blinding — unnatural... And very, very dangerous, Lord Captain. I would never entrust my safety to a being that screams so loudly and clearly of its alienness to human perception."

traits.locale_text: « Il m'a toujours été difficile de lire les couleurs des xénos. La palette qui émane d'Yrliet est... trop pénible à regarder. Ses teintes sont vives, aveuglantes, anormales... et très, très dangereuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Jamais je ne ferais confiance à un être qui crie haut et fort sa non-appartenance à l'humanité. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Zenoların renklerini yorumlamak, oldum olası meşakkatli bir çaba olmuştur. Yrliet'in sınır tanımayan renk paletine baktıkça başıma sancılar giriyor. Renk tonları kör edercesine parlak, doğaya aykırı. Çok ama çok tehlikeli Lord Kaptan. İnsan algısından uzak olduğunu böylesine net ve sert bir şekilde haykıran bir varlığa asla canımı emanet etmezdim."
languages.original_text: "Reading xenos' colours has always been a gruelling challenge for me. The boundless palette of colours Yrliet emanates is... too painful to look at. Her hues are bright — blinding — unnatural... And very, very dangerous, Lord Captain. I would never entrust my safety to a being that screams so loudly and clearly of its alienness to human perception."

traits.locale_text: "Zenoların renklerini yorumlamak, oldum olası başıma dert olmuştur. Yrliet'in sınır tanımayan renk paletine baktıkça başıma sancılar giriyor. Renk tonları kör edercesine parlak, doğaya aykırı... Çok ama çok tehlikeli Lord Kaptan. İnsan algısından uzak olduğunu böylesine net ve sert bir şekilde haykıran bir varlığa asla canımı emanet etmezdim."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
